data.title: IRDT time zone â€” Iran Daylight Time
data.meta_description: What time is it IRDT? Check exact current time and discover the key facts about Iran Daylight Time
data.text:
IRDT (Iran Daylight Time) is one of the well-known names of UTC+4:30 time zone which is 4:30h. ahead of UTC (Coordinated Universal Time).The time offset from UTC can be written as +04:30.

It's used as a DST (summer daylight saving time).During the winter, IRST - Iran Standard Time(UTC+3:30) is in use.
